title: Which is the best website to write SQL blog? - Quora

response.answer_text: You can write a blog on SQL Server related issues on the following sites http://sqlblog.com/default.aspx http://www.sqlservercentral.com/blogs/ http://www.sqlmvp.org/

Sql Server Central Or Simple TAlk. You can start writing your blog in these website, but before this you must give answer of questions asked by developers in these forums, it will help to increase your visibility in forum.
